shortDescription.text: CVE-2020-7598: Improperly Controlled Modification of Object Prototype Attributes ('Prototype Pollution')

help.text:
Affected versions of `minimist` are vulnerable to prototype pollution. Arguments are not properly sanitized, allowing an attacker to modify the prototype of `Object`, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.  
Parsing the argument `--__proto__.y=Polluted` adds a `y` property with value `Polluted` to all objects. The argument `--__proto__=Polluted` raises and uncaught error and crashes the application.  
This is exploitable if attackers have control over the arguments being passed to `minimist`.



## Recommendation

Upgrade to versions 0.2.1, 1.2.3 or later.
help.markdown:
> Affected versions of `minimist` are vulnerable to prototype pollution. Arguments are not properly sanitized, allowing an attacker to modify the prototype of `Object`, causing the addition or modification of an existing property that will exist on all objects.  
Parsing the argument `--__proto__.y=Polluted` adds a `y` property with value `Polluted` to all objects. The argument `--__proto__=Polluted` raises and uncaught error and crashes the application.  
This is exploitable if attackers have control over the arguments being passed to `minimist`.



## Recommendation

Upgrade to versions 0.2.1, 1.2.3 or later.

|                |                                              |
|----------------|----------------------------------------------|
| Package        | pkg:npm/minimist@0.0.10                      |
| Affected range | <0.2.1                                       |
| Fixed version  | 0.2.1                                        |
| CVSS Score     |                                          5.6 |
| CVSS Vector    | CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:L |

shortDescription.text: CVE-2023-25345: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')

help.text: Directory traversal vulnerability in swig-templates thru 2.0.4 and swig thru 1.4.2, allows attackers to read arbitrary files via the include or extends tags.
help.markdown:
> Directory traversal vulnerability in swig-templates thru 2.0.4 and swig thru 1.4.2, allows attackers to read arbitrary files via the include or extends tags.

shortDescription.text: CVE-2021-43138: OWASP Top Ten 2017 Category A9 - Using Components with Known Vulnerabilities

help.text: A vulnerability exists in Async through 3.2.1 (fixed in 3.2.2), which could let a malicious user obtain privileges via the mapValues() method.
help.markdown:
> A vulnerability exists in Async through 3.2.1 (fixed in 3.2.2), which could let a malicious user obtain privileges via the mapValues() method.

|----------------|----------------------------------------------|

| CVSS Vector    | CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H |

shortDescription.text: CVE-2020-36632: Improperly Controlled Modification of Object Prototype Attributes ('Prototype Pollution')

help.text: flat helps flatten/unflatten nested Javascript objects. A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in hughsk flat up to 5.0.0. This affects the function unflatten of the file index.js. The manipulation leads to improperly controlled modification of object prototype attributes ('prototype pollution'). It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. Upgrading to version 5.0.1 can address this issue. The name of the patch is 20ef0ef55dfa028caddaedbcb33efbdb04d18e13. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. The identifier VDB-216777 was assigned to this vulnerability.
help.markdown:
> flat helps flatten/unflatten nested Javascript objects. A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in hughsk flat up to 5.0.0. This affects the function unflatten of the file index.js. The manipulation leads to improperly controlled modification of object prototype attributes ('prototype pollution'). It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. Upgrading to version 5.0.1 can address this issue. The name of the patch is 20ef0ef55dfa028caddaedbcb33efbdb04d18e13. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. The identifier VDB-216777 was assigned to this vulnerability.

|                |                                              |
|----------------|----------------------------------------------|
| Package        | pkg:npm/flat@4.1.1                           |
| Affected range | <5.0.1                                       |
| Fixed version  | 5.0.1                                        |
| CVSS Score     |                                          9.8 |
| CVSS Vector    | CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H |
